title: Component Selection Guide

codeBlocks.code:
Need to structure page content? │ ├─ Fixed navigation needed? │ └─ YES → Use DashboardLayout (Section 20) │ - Includes Sidebar + TopBar + Content area │ - Auto-handles responsive behavior │ ├─ Centered auth/onboarding page? │ └─ YES → Use centered container pattern │
│ ... │
│ └─ Custom layout needed? └─ Use Grid system (Section 20.2) - grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 - Responsive breakpoints built-in

Building a form?
│
├─ Text input needed?
│  ├─ Standard text → TextField (Section 10)
│  ├─ OTP verification → OtpInput (Section 14)
│  └─ File upload → FileUpload (Section 16)
│
├─ Single-page form?
│  └─ Use Form Pattern (Section 18.2)
│     - react-hook-form for validation
│     - Error states per field
│     - Toast for success/error
│
└─ Multi-step wizard?
   └─ Use Multi-Step Pattern (Section 18.3)
      - Progress indicator
      - State persistence (sessionStorage)
      - Back/Next navigation

Need to show user feedback?
│
├─ Immediate action feedback?
│  ├─ Success/Error/Info → Toast (Section 13)
│  │  - Auto-dismisses
│  │  - Non-blocking
│  │  - Top-right position
│  │
│  └─ Confirmation required → Modal (Section 15)
│     - Blocks interaction
│     - Requires explicit action
│     - Backdrop overlay
│
├─ Status indicator needed?
│  └─ Badge (Section 12)
│     - Transaction status
│     - KYC status
│     - Notification counts
│
└─ Loading state?
   ├─ Button action → isLoading prop (Section 9)
   ├─ Page content → Skeleton (Section 23)
   └─ Data operation → Progress bar

## Section 31: Component Selection Guide ### 31.1 Layout Selection Decision Tree ``` Need to structure page content? │ ├─ Fixed navigation needed? │ └─ YES → Use DashboardLayout (Section 20) │ - Includes Sidebar + TopBar + Content area │ - Auto-handles responsive behavior │ ├─ Centered auth/onboarding page? │ └─ YES → Use centered container pattern │
│ ... │
│ └─ Custom layout needed? └─ Use Grid system (Section 20.2) - grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 - Responsive breakpoints built-in ``` ### 31.2 Form Component Selection ``` Building a form? │ ├─ Text input needed? │ ├─ Standard text → TextField (Section 10) │ ├─ OTP verification → OtpInput (Section 14) │ └─ File upload → FileUpload (Section 16) │ ├─ Single-page form? │ └─ Use Form Pattern (Section 18.2) │ - react-hook-form for validation │ - Error states per field │ - Toast for success/error │ └─ Multi-step wizard? └─ Use Multi-Step Pattern (Section 18.3) - Progress indicator - State persistence (sessionStorage) - Back/Next navigation ``` ### 31.3 Feedback Component Selection ``` Need to show user feedback? │ ├─ Immediate action feedback? │ ├─ Success/Error/Info → Toast (Section 13) │ │ - Auto-dismisses │ │ - Non-blocking │ │ - Top-right position │ │ │ └─ Confirmation required → Modal (Section 15) │ - Blocks interaction │ - Requires explicit action │ - Backdrop overlay │ ├─ Status indicator needed? │ └─ Badge (Section 12) │ - Transaction status │ - KYC status │ - Notification counts │ └─ Loading state? ├─ Button action → isLoading prop (Section 9) ├─ Page content → Skeleton (Section 23) └─ Data operation → Progress bar ``` ---
